description.en:
1.	Generation of Variation by Mutation and Recombination
2.	Variation in DNA and Proteins
3.	Variation in Genetically Complex Traits
4.	Random Genetic Drift
5.	Population Structure
6.	Selection on Variation
7.	The Interaction between Selection and Other Forces
8.	Measuring Selection
9.	Phenotypic Evolution
10.	Conflict and Cooperation
11.	Evolution of Genetic Systems
12.	Evolution of Novelty
13.	Models of Evolution
14.	Phylogenetic Reconstruction
description.et:
1.	Varieeruvuse teke mutatsioonide ja rekombinatsiooni teel
2.	DNA ja valkude varieeruvus
3.	Geneetiliste komplekstunnuste varieeruvus
4.	Juhuslik geneetiline triiv
5.	Populatsiooni struktuur
6.	Varieeruvusele rakenduv looduslik valik
7.	Valiku ja teiste protsesside vastasmõju
8.	Valiku mõõtmine
9.	Fenotüübiline evolutsioon
10.	Konflikt ja koostöö
11.	Geneetiliste süsteemide evolutsioon
12.	Uute tunnuste evolutsioon
13.	Evolutsiooni mudelid
14.	Fülogeneetiline rekonstruktsioon

objectives.en: The goal is to build on the course Evolution and the Natural World and give a thorough overview of the theory of evolution and evolutionary processes.
objectives.et: Kursuse eesmärgiks on anda kursusele Elusloodus ja evolutsioon tuginedes põhjalik ülevaade evolutsiooniteooriast ja evolutsioonilistest protsessidest.

learning_outcomes.en: The students will be familiar with and able to compare the effects of different evolutionary processes.
learning_outcomes.et: Üliõpilased tunnevad erinevaid evolutsioonilisi protsesse ja oskavad nende mõju võrrelda.

notes.et:
A detailed description of how the course will work can be found here:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1LNCcwSnj5gXkmiguNRGjshyEXazICb_WzzRuxBYTTEU/edit?usp=sharing

description.et:
The final grade will be made up of three parts:
30% for presenting during the seminars
10% for doing the Moodle tests
60% written exam

grade_preconditions.et: Participation in at least 75% of the seminars.

grade_evaluation.et:
The final grade will be made up of three parts:
30% for presenting during the seminars
10% for doing the Moodle tests
60% written exam

debt_elimination.et: Must be discussed and agreed upon with the lecturers in each case.

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

resources.mandatory_materials: N.H. Barton, D.E.G. Briggs, J.A. Eisen, D.B. Goldstein, N.H. Patel "Evolution" (2007)

name.en: Centre for Genomics, Evolution and  Medicine
